title: Define Project Scope and Requirements - Revised
description: Gather and document the functional and non-functional requirements for the BioEnhancedCognition device. This includes identifying target users, specifying desired cognitive enhancements, addressing safety considerations, ensuring regulatory compliance, securing data privacy, enhancing user experience, outlining integration with existing systems or devices, and considering potential future expansion or upgrades. It is also crucial to establish the system's performance metrics and error handling mechanisms.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including hardware components, software modules, and their interactions.

title: Develop Hardware Components
description: Design and develop the hardware components of the neurostimulation device, including the stimulation circuitry, sensors, and user interface.

title: Develop Software Components
description: Design and develop the software components of the system, including the user interface, data processing, and device control modules.

title: Implement Data Storage and Management
description: Design and implement the data storage and management system for user data, device settings, and cognitive enhancement data.

title: Conduct Security and Privacy Audits
description: Perform security and privacy audits to ensure the system complies with relevant regulations and best practices for handling sensitive user data.

title: Develop Testing and Validation Strategies
description: Design and implement testing and validation strategies for the hardware, software, and overall system, including unit tests, integration tests, and user acceptance tests.

title: Implement Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Set up a continuous integration and deployment pipeline for the software components, ensuring automated testing, building, and deployment.

title: Create User Documentation and Training Materials
description: Develop user documentation, training materials, and support resources for the BioEnhancedCognition device.
